mapper.select: SELECT user_id, `name`, gender, email, profile_image, user_type, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status FROM tb_user where user_type != 3 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{rowIndex},#{pageSize};
SELECT user_id, name, gender, email, profile_image, user_type, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status FROM tb_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT u.user_id, u.name, u.gender, u.email, u.profile_image, u.user_type, u.create_time, u.last_edit_time, u.enable_status FROM tb_local_auth l LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON l.user_id = u.user_id WHERE l.username = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user ( name, gender, email, profile_image, user_type, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{profileImage}, #{userType}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime}, #{enableStatus} )
